body:
Arcbound Overseer's upkeep trigger is placed on the stack properly, but it doesn't actually put +1/+1 counters on anything (either the Overseer itself or any other things with modular I might have in play).

This is 1.23, on OS X.
author: [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/)
title: Arcbound Overseer's upkeep trigger doesn't work

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision f51ce305bda6 .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Thanks for noticing this bug.

It's caused by issue 99 . My fix simply moves the modular ability within the 64 limit.
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

content:
_From [manve.he...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/107839499302741838633/) on March 10, 2012 03:12:28_

Arcbound Overseer's upkeep trigger is placed on the stack properly, but it doesn't actually put +1/+1 counters on anything (either the Overseer itself or any other things with modular I might have in play).

This is 1.23, on OS X.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=184_
